moves.1. e4 c5: Here I'm white playing the sicilian in a blitz game.
moves.2. Nf3: Well, Nc3 could could be fine, but I have a huge preference on open lines and attack. A lot of players on gameknot do Bc4, but I don't think it's that great because there is too much counterplay after that.
moves.2... Nc6 3. d4 cxd4 4. Nxd4 e6 5. Bc4: ?! There is a lot of good possibilities with the sicilian in the opening. Most of the time, people continue with Nc3 or Nb5 here but since it's rare that I come to that line, I wanted to try Bc4. Bc4 was not the best option here since e6 blocks the way to the king and sometime there is a lot of counterplay with Na5 or a6+b5. I think however that it can be useful later in the game.
moves.5... Bb4+: ?! It give too much of counterplay and tempo for white. Ne6 would have been a better option.
moves.6. c3: I didn't wanted to do Nc3 because after Bxc3 bxc3, my pawn structure would have looked bad. It's true that I would have gained some open lines and the bishop but I don't think it was an enough compensation. Bd2 could have been a nice possibility giving me some nice tempo. c3 give the possibility to continue with b4 and a4 later and to secure the center.
moves.6... Bc5 7. O-O Nxd4: ? Very bad idea. Black waste again some tempo and lose the center.
moves.8. cxd4 Bb6 9. Nc3 a6: ?! Black should have done Ne7 here to be able to castle quickly.
moves.10. d5: Trying to take profit of my greater development.
moves.10... exd5: ?! Ne7 would have been probably better.
moves.11... Qf6: ?! I think d6 was mandatory here.
moves.12. d6: !! Now black will have an hard time to continue his development.
moves.12... Bd4: Giving the possibility to capture the d pawn and to do b5.
moves.13. Ne4: ? Nd4 and the game would have been practically over with the threat of Qxd4. Well I was thinking about something bigger.
moves.13... Qe5 14. Re1 Kf8 15. Ng5 Bxf2+: ! This sac took me by surprise, probably the only way for black to continue playing.
moves.16. Kxf2 Qc5+ 17. Re3 Qxc4 18. b3: ! Giving some accesses for my bishop.
moves.21... Qd4+ 22. Kh1 Qxd6 23. a4: ! The queen must move to not get pinned by the bishop.
